title: The Migratory Arctic Tern
description: The Arctic Tern is a seabird that migrates an incredible distance, experiencing two summers a year by flying between the Arctic and Antarctica.

questions.question: Approximately how many miles does an Arctic Tern travel during its annual migration?
Which of the following is a key adaptation that allows the Arctic Tern to survive its long migration?
options: It stores up a massive amount of fat
It has a third set of wings that can extend for extra flight
Its feathers are made of a special material that doesn't get wet

questions.question: What is the primary food source for the Arctic Tern during its travels?
The Arctic Tern lives for an exceptionally long time. What is its approximate lifespan?
Where does the Arctic Tern breed?
